Articles.Content:
After seeing Bobcats test footage of the Apollo Lunar Rover I figured I could make one with only a few mods. All I needed was the hinges from Infernal Robotics placed in the correct orientation. A few tries later and I had it working. It is autonomous as well as able to carry 2 kerbals, a full sensor array and small antenna.

Uploaded to Spaceport under Folding Lightweight Rover.
